name: Zsuzsa
what_you_do: Antavo is a loyalty program vendor for enterprises, offering next-gen solutions that reward not just transactions but also healthy lifestyle choices and referrals.
who_you_serve: Antavo serves enterprises looking to implement innovative loyalty programs, including notable clients like KFC, BMW, and Ripcurl.
current_projects: Constantly developing products with quarterly updates, latest release introduced b2b2c loyalty programs.
social_proof: Listed by Forbes as one of Europe’s top 100 female founders in tech, achieved 3x annual growth in 2021.
bio: Listed by Forbes as one of Europe’s top 100 female founders in tech, achieved 3x annual growth in 2021.
